00034 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_LINUX
00035 static void strlwr(char* x)
00036 {
00037     while (*x)
00038     {
00039         *x = tolower(*x);
00040         x++;
00041     }
00042 }
00043 #endif

00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     ZipArchiveFactory* pZipArchFactory = NULL;
00050     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 
00052     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     extern "C" void dllStartPlugin(void)
00054     {
00055         SET_TERM_HANDLER;
00056 
00057         // Register archive
00058         pZipArchFactory = new ZipArchiveFactory();
00059         ArchiveManager::getSingleton().addArchiveFactory(pZipArchFactory);
00060     }
00061 
00062     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063     extern "C" void dllStopPlugin(void)
00064     {
00065         delete pZipArchFactory;
00066     }
00067 
00068     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069     bool Zip::fileOpen( const String& strFile, FILE** ppFile ) const
00070     {
00071         unz_file_info tagUFI;
00072         FILE *pFile;
00073 
00074         if( unzLocateFile( mArchive, strFile.c_str(), 2 ) == UNZ_OK ) {
00075             //*ppFile = tmpfile();
00076             pFile = *ppFile;
00077 
00078             unzGetCurrentFileInfo( mArchive, &tagUFI, NULL, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, 0 );
00079             unsigned char* pBuffer = new unsigned char[tagUFI.uncompressed_size];
00080             unzOpenCurrentFile( mArchive );
00081             unzReadCurrentFile( mArchive, (void*)pBuffer, tagUFI.uncompressed_size );
00082             unzCloseCurrentFile( mArchive );
00083             fwrite( (void*) pBuffer, 1, tagUFI.uncompressed_size, pFile );
00084             delete[] pBuffer;
00085 
00086             fseek( pFile, 0, SEEK_SET );
00087             return true;
00088         }
00089 
00090         return false;
00091     }
00092 
00093     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094     bool Zip::fileRead( const String& strFile, DataChunk** ppChunk ) const
00095     {
00096         DataChunk* pChunk = *ppChunk;
00097         unz_file_info tagUFI;
00098 
00099         if( unzLocateFile( mArchive, strFile.c_str(), 2 ) == UNZ_OK ) {
00100             unzGetCurrentFileInfo( mArchive, &tagUFI, NULL, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, 0 );
00101             pChunk->allocate(tagUFI.uncompressed_size);
00102             unzOpenCurrentFile( mArchive );
00103             unzReadCurrentFile( mArchive, (void*)pChunk->getPtr(), tagUFI.uncompressed_size );
00104             unzCloseCurrentFile( mArchive );
00105 
00106             return true;
00107         }
00108 
00109         return false;
00110     }

00124     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00125     bool Zip::fileTest( const String& strFile ) const
00126     {
00127         if( unzLocateFile( mArchive, strFile.c_str(), 2 ) == UNZ_OK )
00128             return true;
00129         return false;
00130     }

00156     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------

00198     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00199     StringVector Zip::getAllNamesLike( const String& strStartPath, const String& strPattern, bool bRecursive /* = true */ )
00200     {
00201         StringVector retVec;
00202         unz_file_info info;
00203         char filename[260];
00204         char extraField[260];
00205         char comment[260];
00206         char szPattern[260];
00207 
00208         strncpy( szPattern, strPattern.c_str(), 259 );
00209         strlwr( szPattern );
00210 
00211         int iRes = unzGoToFirstFile(mArchive);
00212         while( iRes == UNZ_OK )
00213         {
00214 
00215             unzGetCurrentFileInfo( mArchive,
00216                          &info,
00217                          filename, 259,
00218                          extraField, 259,
00219                          comment, 259 );
00220 
00221             if( info.uncompressed_size > 0 )
00222             {
00223                 strlwr( filename );
00224                 if( strstr( filename, szPattern ) )
00225                 {
00226                     retVec.push_back(String( filename) );
00227                 }
00228             }
00229 
00230             iRes = unzGoToNextFile( mArchive );
00231         }
00232 
00233         return retVec;
00234     };
00235 
00236     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00237     void Zip::load() {
00238         struct stat tagStat;
00239         stat( mName.c_str(), &tagStat );
00240 
00241         if( ( tagStat.st_mode & S_IFDIR ) )
00242             Except( Exception::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND, "Zip archive " + mName + " not found.",
00243                 "Zip::load" );
00244         else
00245             mArchive = unzOpen( mName.c_str() );
00246 
00247         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage( "Zip Archive codec for " + mName + " created.");
00248     };
00249 
00250     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00251     void Zip::unload() {
00252         if( mArchive )
00253             unzClose( mArchive );
00254 
00255         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage( "Zip Archive Codec for " + mName + " unloaded." );
00256 
00257         delete this;
00258     };
00259
